name: Guest Pre-approval Registration
body: For maximum selection in choosing any of our luxury rental properties, complete our online guest profile to become a pre-approved guest. Register Now .

name: Vacation Property Searches
body: We search for premium rental properties based on your preferred region, lake or community, number of guests & budget. Searches are complimentary. Search Now.

name: Guest Concierge
body: Our concierge can assist with enhanced services such as private chefs, water sports lessons, childcare, yoga on the dock, hot tub rentals, special events & much more. Email our Concierge here !

name: Travel Insurance
body: We offer Travel Medical and Trip Interruption Insurance options for our guests through TD Travel Insurance and Manulife Insurance .
